al kuranaya ha hadisayan ehi mulashrayan we,islam dahama adahana janaya muslim yanuwen hadunwayi.muslim warun eekiya asamasama dewiwarayek wishwasha karayi,[1]ee wagema islam dahama aadikalpitha dahamak lesath aabraham ,mosas ,yesus nabi warun lesath hadunwayi,[2]owun ge pasukalina anugamikayan wisin kalayath samaga dahama wikurthi kara athi bawathya,[3]ee nisa awasana washayen al kuranaya helidarawu kerunu[4] bawa muslim warun wishwasha karayi .islamaya sampurna jiwana salasmak lesa hadunwayi.[5][6] bahuthara muslim waru sunni(75–90%) ha shiya(10–20%) kotas walata ayithi we .13% pamana muslim warun indunisiyawe jiwath we.dakunu aasiyawe 25 % k da ,mada peradiga 20 % k da upa sahara aprikawe 15% sitithi.aasanna washayen biliyana 1.57 pramanayak hewath 23 % k pamana mulu lowama siti .islamaya dewani wishalathama ha lowa wegayen wardhanaya wana dahamaki
